body.name: Dishwasher Installation Kit - 10 FT Stainless Steel Braided Dishwasher Hose kit,Food Grade PEX Inner Tube Dishwasher Water Line with 3/8"x3/8"x3/8" Tee Stop Valve,3/8"x3/8"MIP Elbow,3/8"x3/4"FHT Elbow
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 8 hrs 30 mins
features: 【Universal Dishwasher Installation Kit】:Our dishwasher connection kit provides everything you need in connecting household water supply to dishwasher;suitable for most brand and models dishwasher,such as BOSCH,Samsung, GE, LG, Whirlpool, Frigidaire, etc..In particular the 3/8" x 3/8 "x 3/8" Comp tee stop valve, convenient for you add a branch waterways on the existing water supply and freely control on and off.

【Easy Installation】:The dishwasher water line each end has brass 3/8" compression fittings and built-in high-quality sealing ring,ensure a securely and solid connection; The tee stop valve and elbows with standard thread,plumber's sealant tape is also included in the kit;even DIY,your first installation or replacement work can be completed in minutes,and no leakage.

【Safe material】:Our dishwasher hose inner tube made by food grade PEX materials, non-toxic ingredients,odorless and tasteless, have tested to meet NSF/ANSI standards;the brass tee stop valve and elbows are lead free.Ensure you enjoy the convenience and safety that dishwashers bring to you and your family's lives.

【Prime quality 】:The water line outer layer is wrapped with superior grade 304 stainless steel braided wire,the brass tee stop valve and elbows are single piece brass construction;So all the parts are extremely safe and durable,there is no need to consider replacement for several years.

【Include all parts you need】: Our dishwasher hookup kit includes 10 FT premium stainless steel braided dishwasher water supply line with 3/8" Comp x 3/8" Comp connections,3/8" x 3/8 "x 3/8" Comp Tee Stop Valve,3/8" Comp x 3/8" MIP brass Elbow,3/8" Comp x 3/4" FHT Elbow and Plumbers Tape;Also all the parts come with a 5 year warranty
body.description: Standard 3/8" Comp connectors 1.3/8" brass Comp female fittings ,chrome-plated 2.Double rubber washer 3.304 Stainless steel sleeve

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good value seems good quality. Braided line is kinda light but seems like it will hold up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The dishwasher hookup in this kit leaks. The way it is designed left too large of a gap and leaked. Bought one from a local hardware store and it worked just fine. I only ended up using the t valve in this kit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Make sure you check the water line threads!
reviews.reviewText: I have made way too many trips to the big box stores as I'm helping my son get his house back in order. Ordered this kit to do a brand new dishwasher install. At first, everything looked to be of good quality and even included instructions (which is rare for some of these bargains). I thought I was almost done with my install until I went to connect the water line under the dishwasher and realized there are NO threads on that end of line to connect to the elbow!! Now I'm going to have to make another trip to replace this line since this needs to be done tonight! So, to an earlier reviewer--yes, it IS possible to screw up a water hose connection!
